name: WhisperLens
tagline: Voice to Insight AI Toolkit for Low-Resource Languages
description: WhisperLens is an open-source AI-powered toolkit that transcribes, analyzes, and extracts insights from spoken language â€” designed for low-resource languages and underserved regions. Built using OpenAI Whisper and lightweight language models, it enables developers and communities to create local voice-driven apps for education, healthcare, and accessibility.
motivation: Billions of people speak languages that are not well-supported by mainstream AI tools. WhisperLens aims to democratize speech tech by focusing on inclusivity, privacy, and ease of use for grassroots developers and organizations.

use: Fine-tuning Whisper models for Kannada, Telugu, Tamil, and other low-resource languages
Curating and cleaning multilingual speech and sentiment datasets
Developing a privacy-first local inference engine using Hugging Face Transformers
Building a lightweight web dashboard for transcriptions and insights
funding.description: Seed funding to develop and deploy MVP with 3 languages and a basic UI. Goal is to validate use cases in NGOs and schools in India.

use: Model hosting and API compute credits (e.g., HuggingFace, Replicate, Azure)
Cloud GPU training via AWS, GCP, or Paperspace
funding.description: Optional support for infrastructure and ongoing maintenance.

goals: Enable offline speech-to-text transcription in Indian languages
Allow NGOs and educators to build speech-based applications without coding
Create an inclusive open-source AI community around speech and voice tech
